languages.text:
Например, персонаж пытается обезвредить ловушку. Сложность этого испытания −10, а навык Взрывотехника персонажа равен 50.
Эмулируется бросок кубика, в результате которого игрок получает результат 75.
Так как для успеха персонажу нужно было выкинуть 40 или ниже (Взрывотехника + модификатор сложности = 50 + (−10)), а бросок кубика 75 > 40, то испытание провалено.
Если бы в таком же случае результат броска кубика = 17, то 17<40, испытание было бы пройдено.

Let's say a character is attempting to disarm a trap. The difficulty of this test is −10, and the character's Demolition skill is 50.
The game simulates the die roll, the result of which is 75.
Since the character needed to roll a 40 or lower to pass (Demolition + difficulty modifier = 50 + (−10)), and the roll result is 75, which is greater than 40, the test has been failed.
If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.
languages.original_text:
Например, персонаж пытается обезвредить ловушку. Сложность этого испытания −10, а навык Взрывотехника персонажа равен 50.
Эмулируется бросок кубика, в результате которого игрок получает результат 75.
Так как для успеха персонажу нужно было выкинуть 40 или ниже (Взрывотехника + модификатор сложности = 50 + (−10)), а бросок кубика 75 > 40, то испытание провалено.
Если бы в таком же случае результат броска кубика = 17, то 17<40, испытание было бы пройдено.

traits.locale_text:
Let's say a character is attempting to disarm a trap. The difficulty of this test is −10, and the character's Demolition skill is 50.
The game simulates the die roll, the result of which is 75.
Since the character needed to roll a 40 or lower to pass (Demolition skill + difficulty modifier = 50 + (−10)) and the roll result is 75, which is greater than 40, the test is failed.
If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.

If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.

Let's say a character is attempting to disarm a trap. The difficulty of this test is −10, and the character's Demolition skill is 50.
The game simulates the die roll, the result of which is 75.
Since the character needed to roll a 40 or lower to pass (Demolition + difficulty modifier = 50 + (−10)), and the roll result is 75, which is greater than 40, the test has been failed.
If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.

languages.text:
Gehen wir davon aus, dass ein Charakter versucht, eine Falle zu entschärfen. Die Schwierigkeit dieser Probe ist −10 und die Zerstörungsfertigkeit des Charakters ist 50.
Das Spiel simuliert einen Würfelwurf, dessen Ergebnis bei 75 liegt.
Da der Charakter eine 40 oder niedriger hätte würfeln müssen, um zu bestehen (Zerstörung + Schwierigkeitsmodifikator = 50 + (−10)), und das Wurfergebnis 75 ist, also größer als 40, wurde die Probe nicht bestanden.
Hätte der Charakter eine 17 geworfen, hätte er die Probe bestanden, da 17 < 40.
languages.original_text:
Let's say a character is attempting to disarm a trap. The difficulty of this test is −10, and the character's Demolition skill is 50.
The game simulates the die roll, the result of which is 75.
Since the character needed to roll a 40 or lower to pass (Demolition + difficulty modifier = 50 + (−10)), and the roll result is 75, which is greater than 40, the test has been failed.
If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.

Gehen wir davon aus, dass ein Charakter versucht, eine Falle zu entschärfen. Die Schwierigkeit dieser Probe ist -10 und die Zerstörungsfertigkeit des Charakters ist 50.
Das Spiel simuliert einen Würfelwurf, dessen Ergebnis bei 75 liegt.
Da der Charakter eine 40 oder niedriger hätte würfeln müssen, um zu bestehen (Zerstörung + Schwierigkeitsmodifikator = 50 + (−10)), und das Wurfergebnis 75 ist, also größer als 40, wurde die Probe nicht bestanden.
Hätte der Charakter eine 17 geworfen, hätte er die Probe bestanden, da 17 < 40.

languages.text:
Supposons qu'un personnage tente de désamorcer un piège. La difficulté de ce test est de −10, et la compétence Démolition du personnage est de 50.
Le jeu simule le jet de dés, dont le résultat est 75.
Comme le personnage devait obtenir un résultat de 40 ou moins pour réussir (Démolition + modificateur de difficulté = 50 + (−10)), et que le résultat du jet est de 75, c'est-à-dire supérieur à 40, le test s'est soldé par un échec.
Si le personnage avait obtenu 17 (17 < 40), le test aurait réussi.
languages.original_text:
Let's say a character is attempting to disarm a trap. The difficulty of this test is −10, and the character's Demolition skill is 50.
The game simulates the die roll, the result of which is 75.
Since the character needed to roll a 40 or lower to pass (Demolition + difficulty modifier = 50 + (−10)), and the roll result is 75, which is greater than 40, the test has been failed.
If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.

Supposons qu'un personnage tente de désamorcer un piège. La difficulté de ce test est de -10, et la compétence Démolition du personnage est de 50.
Le jeu simule le jet de dés, dont le résultat est 75.
Comme le personnage devait obtenir un résultat de 40 ou moins pour réussir (Démolition + modificateur de difficulté = 50 + (-10)), et que le résultat du jet est de 75, c'est-à-dire supérieur à 40, le test s'est soldé par un échec.
Si le personnage avait obtenu 17 (17 < 40), le test aurait réussi.

languages.text:
假设一下，您的角色正打算拆除陷阱。检定本身的难度是−10，角色的爆破技能是50。
游戏中的掷骰结果为75。
您的角色需要40或更低的数值，才能通过检定（爆破技能+难度调整值=50+（-10）），而掷出的结果是75，大于40，因此检定失败。
如果角色的掷骰结果为17，小于40，则检定会顺利通过。
languages.original_text:
Let's say a character is attempting to disarm a trap. The difficulty of this test is −10, and the character's Demolition skill is 50.
The game simulates the die roll, the result of which is 75.
Since the character needed to roll a 40 or lower to pass (Demolition + difficulty modifier = 50 + (−10)), and the roll result is 75, which is greater than 40, the test has been failed.
If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.

traits.locale_text:
假设一下，您的角色正打算拆除陷阱。检定本身的难度是−10，角色的爆破技能是50。
游戏中的掷骰结果为75。
您的角色需要40或更低的数值，才能通过检定（爆破技能+难度调整值=50+（-10）），而掷出的结果是75，大于40，因此检定失败。
如果角色的掷骰结果为17，小于40，则检定会顺利通过。

languages.text:
Pongamos que un personaje intenta desactivar una trampa. La dificultad de esta prueba es de −10 y la habilidad Demolición del personaje marca 50.
Al simular la tirada del dado, el resultado que obtenemos es 75.
Puesto que el personaje necesitaba sacar 40 o menos para superar la prueba (Demolición + modificador de dificultad = 50 +(−10)) y el resultado de la tirada es 75, que es más alto que 40, la prueba se da por fallida.
Si el personaje saca 17 con el dado, como 17 < 40, se habría superado la prueba.
languages.original_text:
Let's say a character is attempting to disarm a trap. The difficulty of this test is −10, and the character's Demolition skill is 50.
The game simulates the die roll, the result of which is 75.
Since the character needed to roll a 40 or lower to pass (Demolition + difficulty modifier = 50 + (−10)), and the roll result is 75, which is greater than 40, the test has been failed.
If the character had rolled a 17 on the die, since 17 < 40, the test would have been passed.

traits.locale_text:
Pongamos que un personaje intenta desactivar una trampa. La dificultad de esta prueba es de −10 y la habilidad Demolición del personaje marca 50.
Al simular la tirada del dado, el resultado que obtenemos es 75.
Puesto que el personaje necesitaba sacar 40 o menos para superar la prueba (Demolición + modificador de dificultad = 50 +(−10)) y el resultado de la tirada es 75, que es más alto que 40, la prueba se da por fallida.
Si el personaje saca 17 con el dado, como 17 < 40, se habría superado la prueba.

languages.original_text:
For example, a character is trying to mine a trap. The difficulty of this challenge is -10, and the character's Explosive Technician skill is 50.
A die roll is emulated, giving the player a result of 75.
Since the character needed to roll 40 or lower to succeed (Explosive Engineering + difficulty modifier = 50 + (-10)), and a die roll of 75 > 40, the trial is failed.
If, in the same case, the die roll result = 17, then 17<40, the trial would be passed.

languages.text:
例えば、キャラクターが罠の解除を試みているとしよう。この判定の難易度は−10であり、キャラクターのデモリションスキルは50とする。
ダイスロールが行われ、出た目が75だとする。
キャラクターは判定成功のためには40以下の目が必要（デモリション+ 難易度調整因子= 50 + (−10))であり、サイコロの目は40より大きい75であるため、判定は失敗となる。
キャラクターが17の目を出していたとすれば、17は40より小さいため、判定は成功となる。
